status.description: Specifies the status of this activation job

activation_type.description: Specifies the type of this activation job

activate_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the activation job should be executed. This time should be between some activation window.

activation_windows.description: List of allowed activation windows for this activation job

start_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the activation window starts

end_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the activation window ends

record_type.description: Identifies the type of the resource.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.
